Lyric:
[by:Oliver_PolTerGeist]
[00:07.000]Back when I spent my love on you
[00:11.000]Woke up in the middle of the afternoon
[00:15.000]I said hey, we can't do anything
[00:18.000]Or we can talk about it all night
[00:23.000]End of the night, I'm lost in you
[00:27.000]My last cigarette I gave to you
[00:31.000]You said hey, we can't do anything
[00:34.000]Or we can talk about it all night
[00:38.000]But we won't talk about it all night
[00:41.000]Cuz when I talk about you
[00:44.000]I never feel sorry
[00:46.000]When I am with you
[00:48.000]Oh baby don't worry
[00:50.000]I don't need to tell you but you cut me now
[00:53.000]Cuz we can not not not...
[00:56.000]Cuz we can not not not...
[01:17.000]Tell me a lie, I'll make it true
[01:21.000]Tell me he touches you the way I do
[01:25.000]I said hey, we can't do anything
[01:28.000]Or we can talk about it all night
[01:32.000]But we won't talk about it all night
[01:36.000]Cuz when I talk about you
[01:38.000]I never feel sorry
[01:40.000]When I am with you
[01:42.000]Oh baby don't worry
[01:44.000]I don't need to tell you but you cut me now
[01:47.000]Cuz we can not not not...
[01:51.000]Cuz we can not not not...
[02:04.000]Talk to me
[02:06.000]I promise you will back with me
[02:11.000]I want you to set to free
[02:15.000]And we can not not not...
[02:18.000]And we can not not not...
[02:22.000]Cuz when I talk about you
[02:25.000]I never feel sorry
[02:27.000]When I am with you
[02:28.000]Oh baby don't worry
[02:30.000]I don't need to tell you but you cut me now
[02:34.000]Cuz we can not not not...
[02:37.000]Cuz we can not not not...
